---
title: "Interactive Table"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F,
                      warning = F,
                      message = F,
                      error = F
                    )
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)

df = openxlsx::read.xlsx("data/data_resources.xlsx")
names(df) = gsub("\\.", " ",names(df))

names(df) =  sprintf('<div style="transform:rotate(-70deg);margin-top:100px;">%s</div>',
                     names(df))
                     
datatable(
  df,
  escape = F,
  options = list(
    autoWidth = T,
  columnDefs = list(list(width = '20px',
  className = 'dt-center', targets = 1
  )),
  pageLength = 100,
  lengthMenu = NULL
  ),
  rownames = F
  )
      
```


* Data release lag is about 6 months or less.  ** Data release; 5=every five years; 3=every 3 years; a.=annually; b.=biannually; q.=quarterly; m.=monthly; w=weekly, v.=varies;  â€ =discontinued.
